<a id="CanvasModulate"></a>

# CanvasModulate

**Inherits:** [Node2D](Node2D.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A node that applies a color tint to a canvas.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**CanvasModulate** applies a color tint to all nodes on a canvas. Only one can be used to tint a canvas, but [CanvasLayer](CanvasLayer.md)\\ s can be used to render things independently.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [2D lights and shadows](../tutorials/2d/2d_lights_and_shadows.md)
